note.p: Birth: Papworth St Agnes, Cambridgeshire, England (03 October 1712)
Death: The house of his wife's brother, Sir Anthony Abdy (05 October 1771)
Burial: Chancel of Barley church, Hertfordshire
References: L B Glyn, 'Israel Lyons: a short but starry career. The life of an eighteenth-century Jewish botanist and astronomer' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 275-305
S Katzir 'Who knew piezoelectricity? Rutherford and Langevin on submarine detection and the invention of sonar.' in NR 2012 Vol. 66 number 2, pages 141-158
Notes: Referred to as Thomas Rutherforth in the DNB.
